description: High Level Summary of Performance Data

targets.query: SELECT distinct("smb_rate") AS "${SMB_TARGET}  ${SMB_FILENAME2}  " FROM "wiperf-smb" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$WLANPi$/ AND "smb_host" =~ /^$SMB_TARGET$/ AND "filename" =~ /^$SMB_FILENAME2$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(null)

SELECT distinct("smb_rate") AS "${SMB_TARGET}  ${SMB_FILENAME3}  " FROM "wiperf-smb" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$WLANPi$/ AND "smb_host" =~ /^$SMB_TARGET$/ AND "filename" =~ /^$SMB_FILENAME3$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(null)

SELECT distinct("smb_time") AS " ${SMB_TARGET}  ${SMB_FILENAME1}  " FROM "wiperf-smb" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$WLANPi$/ AND "smb_host" =~ /^$SMB_TARGET$/ AND "filename" =~ /^$SMB_FILENAME1$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(null)

SELECT distinct("smb_time") AS "${SMB_TARGET} /${SMB_FILENAME2}  " FROM "wiperf-smb" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$WLANPi$/ AND "smb_host" =~ /^$SMB_TARGET$/ AND "filename" =~ /^$SMB_FILENAME2$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(null)

SELECT distinct("smb_time") AS "${SMB_TARGET} /${SMB_FILENAME3}  " FROM "wiperf-smb" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$WLANPi$/ AND "smb_host" =~ /^$SMB_TARGET$/ AND "filename" =~ /^$SMB_FILENAME3$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(null)

SELECT distinct("smb_time") AS "${SMB_TARGET} /${SMB_FILENAME4}  " FROM "wiperf-smb" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$WLANPi$/ AND "smb_host" =~ /^$SMB_TARGET$/ AND "filename" =~ /^$SMB_FILENAME4$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(null)

SELECT distinct("smb_time") AS "${SMB_TARGET} /${SMB_FILENAME5}  " FROM "wiperf-smb" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$WLANPi$/ AND "smb_host" =~ /^$SMB_TARGET$/ AND "filename" =~ /^$SMB_FILENAME5$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(null)
SELECT difference(last("tx_retries")) AS "TX Retry Count" FROM "wiperf-network" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$WLANPi$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("channel") AS "Channel" FROM "wiperf-network" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$WLANPi$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(null)

SELECT "bssid" AS "BSSID", "ssid" AS "SSID", "channel" AS "Channel", "channel_width" AS "Channel Width", "tx_rate_mbps" AS "Tx Phy Rate (Mbps)", "rx_rate_mbps" AS "Rx Phy Rate (Mbps)", "signal_level_dbm" AS "RSSI (dBm)" FROM "wiperf-network" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$WLANPi$/) AND $timeFilter

title: 06 - SMB Report
